meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny! Get ready for a groovy review that's gonna make you wanna put on your best pair of bell-bottom jeans and dig into some serious dungeon crawling action!

Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord is back, baby! And I'm not just talking about any old-school RPG – no way, José! This remake is a far-out tribute to the original 1981 game that'll transport you straight to the era of mullets and mixtapes.

But don't worry, folks; this ain't your grandma's Wizardry (no offense to grandma, by the way). Digital Eclipse has done an ace job of updating the graphics and sound without sacrificing the charm and challenge that made the original so rad. You'll still have to navigate treacherous dungeons, defeat fearsome beasts, and solve puzzles that'll drive you bonkers – all while trying not to get your party wiped out by a pesky goblin.

Now, I know what you're thinking: "Is this game too hard for me?" Well, let's just say that it's like riding a bike with training wheels off – once you get the hang of it, you'll be rolling like a pro! Sure, some critics might say that it's a bit of a step back for newcomers (ahem, SECTOR.sk), but trust me, if you're willing to put in the time and effort, you'll be rewarded with an experience that's simply... far out!

So, what did our fellow critics have to say? Well, Hardcore Gamer gave it a solid 70, praising its nostalgic value and punishing gameplay. IGN Italia also chimed in with a 70, calling it a "competent remake" that stuck too close to the original (but hey, that's what makes it so darn cool!). The Games Machine was a bit more effusive, giving it a 73 for being a "masterstroke from Digital Eclipse" – even if they did feel it was a bit limited in its mechanics. And finally, Multiplayer.it gave it an 80, saying it was a great remake that might be a bit too hard for the modern audience (but hey, we all know that's what makes it so much fun!).

In conclusion, Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord is a blast from the past that's guaranteed to get your groove on! So, put on your best platform shoes, grab your trusty torch, and get ready to embark on an adventure that's simply... out of sight!
